name: Bakeocalypse
description:
Bakeocalypse is a cooking simulator with a twist!

You're cooking for zombies so they won't eat your brains!

In this fast-paced adventure you play as Chef Chungus, a chef forced to cook for his survival (or maybe he's blind?) , how long can you survive the CHAOS, will you break under all that pressure?

(This was made for the Brackeys 2021.2 GameJam)

(If you have performance issues with the WebGL build, please download a build for your platform instead)
